16.0 Million Effective Pixels, Lens Construction: 8 Elements in 8 Groups (1 ED Lens Element), Digital Zoom Magnification Upto 4x (Angle of View Equivalent Approx: 1000 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Motion Blur Reduction, Motion Detection, Focus Range (Approx: 50 cm (W) to Infinity, Approx: 1.0 m (T) to Infinity, Macro Mode: Approx 10 cm to Infinity, Focus-area Selection (Face Priority, Auto (9-area Automatic Selection), Center, Manual, Subject Tracking, Monitor (5 Level Brightness Adjustment), Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Continuous Shooting: Single (Default Setting), Continuous H (Images are Taken 8 fps), Continuous L (Upto 18 Images are Taken 1.4 fps), Continuous H: 120 fps (50 Frames are Captured 120 fps or Faster), Continuous H: 60 fps (25 Frames are Captured 60 fps or Faster), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16, Movie (HD 1080p (Fine) Default Setting: 1920 x 1080, 30 fps, HD 1080p: 1920 x 1080, 30 fps, HD 720p: 1280 x 720, 30 fps, VGA: 640 x 480, 30 fps, HS 240 fps: 320 x 240, HS 120 fps: 640 x 48, HS 60 fps: 1280 x 720, HS 15 fps: 1920 x 1080, Exposure Control (-2.0 - .0 EV in increment of 1/3 EV), Shutter Mechanical and CMOS Electronic Shutter, Speed (1 / 4000 sec (Maximum Speed During High-speed Continuous Shooting) 4 sec (Fireworks Show Scene Mode)), Electronically-controlled ND Filter (-2 AV) Selection Aperture, Flash Control (TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes), HDMI Output (Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i), Input / Output Terminal (Digital Input / Output (USB), HDMI Mini Connector (Type C) (HDMI output)), GPS (Receiver Frequency 1575.42 MHz (C/A Code), Geodetic System WGS 84), Charging Time 4 Hours (with Charging AC Adapter EH-69P when Battery is Fully Discharged), Battery Life Still Pictures 140 Shots when Using EN-EL12, Tripod Socket (1/4 (ISO 1222)), Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Operating Humidity: 80 % or Less (Condensation), Android 2.3.3 Operating System, Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Standards (IEEE 802.11 b/g/n (Standard Wireless LAN Protocol), WPS 2.0 (Certified Compliant with Wi-Fi Alliance Standards), ARIB STD-T66 (Standard for Low Power Data Communications Systems), Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Communications Protocols (IEEE 802.11 b: DBPSK, DQPSK, IEEE 802.11 g: OFDM, IEEE 802.11 n: OFDM), Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Range (Line of Sight) 60 m (65 yd) (Varies with Location), Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Operating Frequency (2412 - 2462 MHz (1 - 11 Channels)), Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Data Rates (Actual Measured Values) (IEEE 802.11 b: 5 Mbps, IEEE 802.11 g: 20 Mbps, IEEE 802.11 n: 25 Mbps), Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Security WPA / WPA2 / WEP, Wi-Fi (Wireless LAN) Access Protocols Infrastructure, Bluetooth Standards (Ver 2.1 EDR), A2DP Profile, Coretex-A9 Processor, 512 MB RAM, Stereo Sound, Cannot Get with Smart Phones, Customize Your Style of Visual Communication with Over 500,000 Apps on Google Play
